original_text: This happened because of the sins Jeroboam had committed and had caused Israel to commit, and because he aroused the anger of the Lord, the God of Israel.
korean_text: 이는 여로보암이 범죄하고 또 이스라엘에게 범하게 한 죄로 말미암음이며 또 그가 이스라엘의 하나님 여호와를 노엽게 한 일 때문이었더라

sentences.original_text: This happened because of the sins
and had caused Israel to commit
and because he aroused the anger
of the Lord, the God of Israel
